tool_description: A simple HTTPS api that can randomly select and return a fact from the FFA database.
name: Fun Fact
title: Fun Fact

api_list.name: Image (Primary)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fun-fact.p.rapidapi.com/image/primary"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fun-fact.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
